verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H2142>remember<s%> for <S%H1732>David<s%> All his <S%H6031>affliction<s%>;
How he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And <S%H5087>vowed<s%> unto the <S%H46>Mighty<s%> One of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>:
Surely I will not <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%>, Nor go <S%H5927>up<s%> into my <S%H6210>bed<s%>;
I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H8153>sleep<s%> to mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, Or <S%H8572>slumber<s%> to mine <S%H6079>eyelids<s%>;
Until I find <S%H4672>out<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, A <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> for the <S%H46>Mighty<s%> One of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
Lo <S%H8085><s%>, we heard of it in <S%H672>Ephrathah<s%>: We <S%H4672>found<s%> it in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of the <S%H3293>wood<s%>.
We will <S%H935>go<s%> into his <S%H4908>tabernacles<s%>; We will <S%H7812>worship<s%> at his <S%H1916>footstool<s%>.
Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, into thy <S%H4496>resting-place<s%>; <S%H727>Thou<s%>, and the ark of thy <S%H5797>strength<s%>.
Let thy <S%H3548>priest<s%> be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>; And let thy <S%H2623>saints<s%> shout for <S%H7442>joy<s%>.
For thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s sake Turn not <S%H7725>away<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of thine <S%H4899>anointed<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> in <S%H571>truth<s%>; He will not <S%H7725>turn<s%> from <S%H6529>it<s%>: Of the fruit of thy <S%H990>body<s%> will I <S%H7896>set<s%> upon thy <S%H3678>throne<s%>.

If thy <S%H1121>children<s%> will <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> And my <S%H5713>testimony<s%> <S%H2090>that<s%> I shall <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H1121>them<s%>, Their children also shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon thy <S%H3678>throne<s%> for <S%H5703>evermore<s%>.
For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; He hath <S%H183>desired<s%> it for his <S%H4186>habitation<s%>.
This is my <S%H4496>resting-place<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>: Here will I <S%H3427>dwell<s%>; For I have desired <S%H183>it<s%>.
I will <S%H1288>abundantly<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> her <S%H6718>provision<s%>: I will <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> her <S%H34>poor<s%> with <S%H3899>bread<s%>.
Her <S%H3548>priests<s%> also will I <S%H3847>clothe<s%> with <S%H3468>salvation<s%>; And her <S%H2623>saints<s%> shall shout <S%H7442>aloud<s%> for <S%H7444>joy<s%>.
There will I <S%H6779>make<s%> the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H6779>bud<s%>: I have <S%H6186>ordained<s%> a <S%H5216>lamp<s%> for mine <S%H4899>anointed<s%>.
His <S%H341>enemies<s%> will I <S%H3847>clothe<s%> with <S%H1322>shame<s%>; But upon himself shall his <S%H5145>crown<s%> <S%H6692>flourish<s%>.
